Source [altcat_3]

definition
let C be non empty with_units AltCatStr ;
let o1, o2 be Object of C;
let A be Morphism of o1,o2;
attr A is coretraction means :: ALTCAT_3:def 3
 ex B being Morphism of o2,o1 st B is_left_inverse_of A;
end;
